mapper.insert: insert into tbl_store (store_market_id, store_owner_id, store_category_id, store_name, store_intro, store_address) values (#{storeMarketId}, #{storeOwnerId}, #{storeCategoryId}, #{storeName}, #{storeIntro}, #{storeAddress});
mapper.select: select id, store_market_id, store_owner_id, store_category_id, store_name, store_intro, store_address, store_score, store_state, store_is_confirmed, created_datetime, updated_datetime from tbl_store

select distinct s.id, s.store_name, s.store_address, s.store_category_id, s.store_state, s.store_market_id, s.store_intro,
c.category_name as storeCategoryName,
f.file_name as fileName, f.file_origin_name as fileOriginName, f.file_saved_path as fileSavePath from tbl_store s join tbl_category c on s.store_category_id = c.id left join tbl_file_store fs on s.id = fs.store_id left join tbl_file f on f.id = fs.id
limit #{criteria.count} offset #{criteria.offset}
mapper.update: update tbl_store set store_name = #{storeName}, store_intro = #{storeIntro}, store_category_id = #{storeCategoryId}, store_address = #{storeAddress}, updated_datetime = current_timestamp where id = #{id}
update tbl_store set store_is_confirmed = true, store_state = 'open' where id = #{id}
